abstract.t: LoST maps service identifiers and location information to servicecontact URIs. If a LoST client wants to discover available servicesfor a particular location, it will perform a <listServicesByLocation>query to the LoST server. However, the response from the LoST serverdoes not provide information about the geographical region for whichthe returned service list is valid. Therefore, this documentproposes a ServiceListBoundary to assist the client to not miss achange in available services when moving.
